title: At least arams are still fun

replies.body: beep boop we have come to destroy the fun.
yeah once you get above the mmr where there are bots for days lol

It gets really fun when you get to the mmr where the aram only accounts are.

I'm serious, you really learn to play against those champs and nobody there knows how to play against wierd stuff like Skarner, Lulu, and Shyvana.
